value:
I'm not thrilled about how I got here,
but seeing folks from different worlds
work together like this? It's nice.

Someday I'll lead the Leicester
Alliance, but my ambitions are far
grander. I want to change the world.

I like you. If you want something,
you don't just pray for it—you take
action. We have that in common.

Everyone here takes themselves
so seriously. Why don't we have a
feast? That would lighten things up.

I've been mixing up a new poison.
Some might call it a dirty trick, but
I just like to come prepared.

I was asked to say hello by
$Nf, so... Hello!
And with that, I'll be off.
Sometimes I even surprise myself.
I expected as much.
Not one of my finer moments.
I'll put this power to good use.

I'm Claude. I'm not big on formalities,
so no need to put on airs. Feel free to
throw me a feast any time, though.

I didn't plan on staying here this long.
Time flies, I guess. Sometimes I wish
I could leave, but then I think about...$k$pYou. There's something about you.
You have a presence that compels
people to follow you—me included.$k$pI've never been much of a follower,
but you make me so curious, I can't
help but stay by your side.$k$pI'll go back to my world someday.
Before that happens, though, I want
to learn more about you.$k$pSo I'm planning to stick close to you
from now on. That won't be an issue,
right? I'm a useful guy to have around.
はあっ！
おらあっ！
うおおっ
効いたぜ…！
Strategy in motion!
My moment has arrived!
Don't hold this against me, OK?
Enough is enough.
We'll call it...a stalemate.
Right here!
People say I'm not very noble. That's a compliment, right?
Don't spook me like that! I mean...it's not like I was scheming or anything.
The world would be better off without the false belief systems that we're bound to... Eh, that's what I think anyway.
It’s time to celebrate! If you even think about sleeping tonight, I’ll consider it a personal insult.
Back home, we have a tradition. Win or lose, we celebrate with a rowdy feast!
We only have this one life...and counting on the gods will just get you killed.
You and I, we're both outsiders in this world. All the more reason to stick together.
All right.
Where to?
Lead and I'll follow.
